context_bundle.summary: The Boghossian-influenced epistemological method. How do you know what you think you know? Knowledge as process with provenance, not inventory. Questioning belief foundations through dialogue, not debate.

onboarding.quick_start: Core questions: How do I know this? Why do I know this? How did I come to think I know anything about this? Did I arrive here through reason or absorb through proximity? The meta-level: Why am I drawn to this question at all?
common_patterns: Question orientation to facts not just facts
known_errors: Most people's relationship to ideas is defensive - territory to hold, not tools for understanding
